consent-form.agreement1: I understand the importance of my role in preventing the spread of covid-19 by washing my hands frequently for 20 seconds, keeping 6 feet between myself and others, and wearing a mask as guided by public health officials
consent-form.agreement2: I consent to the collection of specimen (finger stick for antibody) or oropharyngeal nasopharyngeal.  I consent to both in person and telehealth supervised collection of specimens.   I acknowledge that the manufacturer of the covid-19 antibody test / covid-19 testing( oropharyngeal nasopharyngeal or sputum) being provided has received an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) request by the  U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and has received a written acknowledgment from FDA that these tests are based on the authorized assay developed by the Centers for Disease Control & Prevention (CDC). All testing will be performed in accordance with current FDA guidance however; covid-19 antibody testing is a rapidly evolving area of science. KDunn and Associates, PA make no promises or guarantees regarding the accuracy and reliability of these tests. Under no circumstances shall KDunn and Associates, PA be held responsible or liable in any way for any claims, damages, losses, expenses, costs or liabilities whatsoever (including, without limitation, any direct or indirect damage)  resulting or arising directly or indirectly from patients reliance on the result of these COVID-19 antibody tests.
consent-form.agreement3: I understand that data that is collected will only be used for the purpose of testing or tracking symptoms for the purpose of identifying and tracking COVID-19. Personal information that is required by Public Health Law will be disclosed. All Personnel that have access to personal health information have been trained in HIPAA and HealthQuilt policies and procedures.
consent-form.agreement4: I understand that de-identified data may be used for research to understand COVID-19
consent-form.agreement5: I understand and authorize the management of information and its release according to HIPAA standards and authorize my practitioners listed in my care plan to share information on behalf of my care and for billing purposes.

covid19-form.location-contact-question: Have you had contact with any of the following?
covid19-form.traveled-question: Have you traveled to (not airport travel) or resided in a CDC Level 3 restricted area OR a community where local transmission of COVID-19 is occurring within the last 14 days?
covid19-form.contact-question: Have you had known contact* with a person who is under investigation or tested positve for 2019-nCov?
covid19-form.symptoms-question: Do you have any of the following signs and/or symptoms? Please check all that apply.
covid19-form.shortnet-breath: Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing
covid19-form.loss-taste-smell: New loss of taste or smell
covid19-form.signs-question: Do you have any additional signs and/or symptoms? Please check all that apply
covid19-form.additional-signs-question: Any Other additional signs and/or symptoms?
covid19-form.conditions-question: Do you have any chronic medical conditions (heart disease, HTN, diabetes, lung disease, etc)? *

account-activation.activation-success: Account activated! You can now login.
